q1: Do you think this team will qualify for the next World Cup?
a1: Unfortunatly given their previous results I do not think that they will qualify.
q2: Do they need to improve their youth department to be a consistent participant in the World Cups?
a2: for sure. Also senegal has a chance, but Africa can be very competitive.  Ghana, Nigeria, and Egypt make it very tough to qualify.
q3: Would a new coach help the Senegal qualify?
a3: they should win but they practice in good coach
q4: did senegal do enough in this world cup to make you beleive that they can be a regular in the world cup?
a4: I think they'll make it again next time around. They seemed solid.
